participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and curious, Evelyn loves exploring new experiences and has a vibrant spirit.
participant_1.background: I treasure my collection of vintage horror movies, which I love to watch with my grandchildren. I love to go outside at night and eavesdrop on my neighbors' arguments. I like fitness. I love adrenaline rushes and pushing myself to the limit. I moved to NY to study in a prestigious designing school.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Observant and determined, Jordan is focused on his goals and enjoys noticing the little details in life.
participant_2.background: I keep my blue and hazel eyes open and take mental notes of the world around me. I'm afraid of not being able to beat my competitors in the marathon. I hate Mexican food. During the week, I work as a barista. I am in good shape and my weight is healthy.

content.text: It's going alright! How about you?
Pretty good! I just moved to New York City to study at a prestigious designing school.
That's awesome! What kind of designing do you want to do?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm excited to explore my options.
That's great! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to watch vintage horror movies, and I go outside at night to eavesdrop on my neighbors arguments.
That's interesting! I keep my blue and hazel eyes open and take mental notes of the world around me.
That's a great way to stay aware of your surroundings.
Thanks! I'm afraid of not being able to beat my competitors in the marathon.
That's a good goal to have! I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks! I work as a barista during the week to help me pay for school.
That's a great way to make money while you're in school.
I know, right? It's also a lot of fun!
I'm sure it is! I love coffee.
Me too! I can't get enough of it.
